Package org.thewhitemage13.service

Class ValidationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.service.ValidationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValidationServiceInterface
@Service public class ValidationServiceImpl extends Object implements ValidationServiceInterface
Service implementation that coordinates various validation tasks related to user information.

This service acts as a central hub for validating different aspects of a user's profile, such as username, email, phone number, password, media (profile picture), followers, and posts. It delegates validation tasks to specific services for each aspect.

Key Features:

  • Validates username, email, phone number, password, media (profile picture), posts, followers, and following.
  • Handles user updates by validating the provided details and ensuring they don't conflict with existing records.
  • Supports validation of both new user data and updates to existing user profiles.

Dependencies:

  • EmailValidationServiceImpl - Service for validating email addresses.
  • FollowerValidationServiceImpl - Service for validating follower counts.
  • MediaValidationServiceImpl - Service for validating media URLs, such as profile pictures.
  • PasswordValidationServiceImpl - Service for validating passwords according to defined rules.
  • PhoneValidationServiceImpl - Service for validating phone numbers.
  • PostValidationServiceImpl - Service for validating the number of posts a user has.
  • UserActivityValidationServiceImpl - Service for validating user activity, such as email, phone number, and username.

Exception Handling:

  • NumberParseException - Thrown if a phone number is incorrectly formatted.
  • Various other exceptions (e.g., email-related, username-related) are handled by delegated services.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

    • validateUpdateUser

      public String validateUpdateUser(CreateUserDTO createUserDTO, User updateUser) throws com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException
      Validates the user details during an update.

      This method checks if the provided email, phone number, and username conflicts with existing records.

      Specified by:
      validateUpdateUser in interface ValidationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      createUserDTO - the DTO containing the updated user details
      updateUser - the existing user entity being updated
      Returns:
      the formatted phone number if valid
      Throws:
      com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException - if the phone number is invalid
